name: Logger

grantsPowers.name: Empowered Logging
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Adds Logging specific Buffs to all Energetic Harvesting Buffs

description: A felling axe is a logger's best friend. Even a small axe can take down a big tree, and the resources it yields hold endless possibilities.
lore: The fresh smell of sawdust is the sweetest scent one can inhale.
